title: update failed unspecified error occurred please check the logs for more information. help pls
body:
i try the hextech repair tool and reinstall the game but it still not working {{item:3070}} 
i recovery today and then try to download league this is what happens.
sorry if my english is bad 
image : https://postimg.org/image/627e5czu5/

replies.body: It looks like your OS is blocking access from some of your files, so it can't continue scanning and applying updates.  I recommend using our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure the patcher can finish up its scan.  Thanks for the screenshot btw, it gave all the context!
